scripts.build: lerna run build --ignore @devexpress/dx-vue-* && yarn run build:ts
scripts.build:react:grid:watch: concurrently "yarn build:ts:watch" "lerna run --scope @devexpress/dx-core --scope @devexpress/dx-react-core --scope @devexpress/dx-testing --parallel build" "lerna run --scope @devexpress/dx-grid-core --scope "@devexpress/*react-grid*" --parallel build:watch"
scripts.build:react:chart:watch: concurrently "yarn build:ts:watch" "lerna run --scope @devexpress/dx-core --scope @devexpress/dx-react-core --scope @devexpress/dx-testing --parallel build" "lerna run --scope @devexpress/dx-chart-core --scope "@devexpress/*react-chart*" --parallel build:watch"
scripts.build:react:scheduler:watch: concurrently "yarn build:ts:watch" "lerna run --scope @devexpress/dx-core --scope @devexpress/dx-react-core --scope @devexpress/dx-testing --parallel build" "lerna run --scope @devexpress/dx-scheduler-core --scope "@devexpress/*react-scheduler*" --parallel build:watch"
scripts.build:site: yarn run build:site:demos && yarn run build:site:docs
scripts.build:site:demos: yarn run build:ts && lerna run build --ignore @devexpress/dx-react-grid-demos --ignore @devexpress/dx-react-chart-demos --ignore @devexpress/dx-react-scheduler-demos --ignore @devexpress/dx-vue-* && lerna run build:prod --scope @devexpress/dx-react-grid-demos --scope @devexpress/dx-react-chart-demos --scope @devexpress/dx-react-scheduler-demos
